official_title: To amend the Truth in Lending Act to require a credit card issuer to disclose only 1 annual percentage rate of interest in any preapproved application or solicitation to open a credit card account under an open end consumer credit plan, and for other purposes.
short_title: Truth in Credit Card Offers Act

summary.text: Truth in Credit Card Offers Act - Amends the Truth in Lending Act to declare that: (1) only one annual percentage rate of interest may be disclosed as the applicable rate for preapproved credit card solicitations or applications for an open end consumer credit plan; and (2) the typeface used to disclose such rate shall be twice as high as that used for any other item in the table.
